Package distances.kernel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KernelMatrixUserInterface
    This interface is used by learner methods to require kernel matrices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ANOVAKernel
    Sum over all dimensions of: exp(-sigma*(x_i-y_i)^2)^d.
    CauchyKernel
    The Cauchy kernel comes from the Cauchy distribution (Basak, 2008).
    ChiSquaredKernel  
    CircularKernel
    The circular kernel is used in geostatic applications.
    ExponentialKernel
    The difference between this and the Gaussian Kernel is that the norm is not squared.
    GaussianKernel  
    GeneralizedHistogramKernel
    The Generalized Histogram Intersection kernel is built based on the Histogram Intersection Kernel for image classification but applies in a much larger variety of contexts (Boughorbel, 2005).
    GeneralizedTStudentKernel  
    InverseMultiQuadraticKernel
    The Inverse Multi Quadric kernel.
    Kernel
    The class that all kernel functions should extend.
    LaplacianKernel
    Exponential, but less sensitive to sigma.
    LogKernel
    The Log kernel seems to be particularly interesting for images, but is only conditionally positive definite.
    MinKernel
    The Histogram Intersection Kernel is also known as the Min Kernel and has been proven useful in image classification.
    MultiQuadraticKernel
    The Multiquadric kernel can be used in the same situations as the Rational Quadratic kernel.
    PolynomialKernel
    K(x,y) = (slope * xTy + c)^d
    PowerKernel
    The Power kernel is also known as the (unrectified) triangular kernel.
    RationalQuadraticKernel
    The Rational Quadratic kernel is less computationally intensive than the Gaussian kernel and can be used as an alternative when using the Gaussian becomes too expensive.
    RBF
    e^(-gamma * |x-y|^2)
    SigmoidKernel
    tanh(slope * xTy + c)
    SphericalKernel
    The spherical kernel is similar to the circular kernel, but is positive definite in R3.
    SplineKernel
    The Spline kernel is given as a piece-wise cubic polynomial, as derived in the works by Gunn (1998).
    TranslationInvariantWaveletKernel
    This class implements the translation invariant wavelet kernel.
    WaveKernel
    The Wave kernel is also symmetric positive semi-definite (Huang, 2008).
